Texto: 
plain film shows realtive lucency surrounding distal tibial external fixator screw

discordance between in-111 wbc and tc99m sulfur colloid radiotracer accumulation in area of above mentioned external fixator screw- c/w osteomyelitis
osteomyelitis
osteomyelitis
other considerations are excluded by this test, but would include post-traumatic or post-operative marrow packing or marrow activation.
24 year old male s/p trauma to right lower extremity with extensive internal/external fixation - with suspicion for osteomyelitis
